Key Match Events: Conine collected three hits and one RBI
Xzavion Curry pitched five strong innings in his first start with the Marlins
Jonah Bride produced a two-out RBI single and Conine followed with an RBI double
Dane Myers just missed a grand slam in the next at-bat, settling for a two-run double
Myers' three-run homer capped a five-RBI performance for Miami's center fielder
Pre-Game Insights: Conine hoped to play at the Blue Jays’ home ballpark one day
Conine was looking forward to playing in this park because it's a really awesome place to play and he has a lot of friends and coaches that he worked with a lot
Post-Match Reflections: Conine said it feels good to see his former coaches still rooting for him
Myers said he loves Conine's game and thinks they have similar approaches and swings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins have won four of five on their season-ending road trip
Conine was involved in Miami’s rallies in the first, sixth and eighth innings
Conine added a single in the eighth, then he came in to score on Myers' three-run homer
Others: Conine was drafted by the Blue Jays in the second round of the 2018 MLB Draft and was later traded to the Marlins in 2020
Conine is a left-handed hitter who has improved his batting average and reduced his strikeouts over the past three years
